Design & Features

The Space You Can Plan Your Life Around

Explore our Homes

A Home You'll Be Proud to Call Your Own

At Harmoni, we don't just build houses—we create homes for real families. Guided by our three core principles, every detail of your home is crafted to enrich your life:

Thoughtful Design

Elegant, functional spaces for modern living

Uncompromising Quality

Built to last with care and precision

Natural Beauty

Green spaces that bring tranquility to your doorstep

Thoughtful Design: Spaces Tailored for You

Harmoni homes offer two thoughtfully crafted layouts, designed to suit your lifestyle:

Type A:
A classic layout with the living room at the front—the perfect gathering space for family and friends.

Type B:
A modern design with the living area at the back, opening onto a spacious private garden for privacy and serenity.

Double-Volume Ceilings in the living area provide natural light, better ventilation, and a stunning sense of space, creating a luxurious yet welcoming ambiance.

Whether you choose Type A or Type B, every home offers the prestige of double-storey living with bedrooms upstairs for added privacy and peaceful retreat spaces.

Uncompromising Quality: Built for Generations

Every Harmoni home is a reflection of our commitment to lasting excellence:

Durable Materials:
Crafted to stand the test of time.

Comfort-First Features:
From wheelchair-friendly bathrooms to air-conditioning points, designed for convenience and ease.

Reliable Systems:
Water booster pumps, premium locksets, and thoughtful infrastructure ensure worry-free living.

At Harmoni, we don't just meet expectations—we exceed them, delivering homes you can trust for years to come.

Natural Beauty: A Space to Make Memories

Your Harmoni home is more than just walls and rooms—it's a gateway to a life surrounded by nature and community:

Spacious Private Gardens:
Among the largest in the area, perfect for outdoor meals, playtime, or a personal retreat.

A 25,833 sqft Park:
With jogging paths, open spaces, and two multi-purpose courts for sports and recreation.

Community Connection:
Designed for families and neighbors to bond, creating a vibrant and welcoming neighborhood.

Live in a home where tranquility and convenience go hand in hand.
